title: Inquire About Theme Park Hours
description: A visitor wants to know the opening and closing times for Disneyland on an upcoming Saturday.

tasks.description: Identify the park (Disneyland) and the date (upcoming Saturday).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the visitor's query.

tasks.description: Retrieve the park's operating hours for that specific date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the park is open from 8 AM to 11 PM.

tasks.description: Communicate the opening and closing times to the visitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly provides the correct hours.
